address: 97 Outram Street, WEST PERTH, WA, AUSTRALIA, 6005
summary:
Western Gold is a resource exploration company with a prospective gold project, the Wiluna West Gold Project, located approximately 35 to 45 km south west of the township of Wiluna in Western Australia.
The Wiluna West Gold Project is located on 7 granted mining leases occupying a total area of 85.8 km2. The Wiluna West Gold Project has an Indicated and Inferred JORC-2012 Mineral Resource estimate
